name: Eternal Return
description: Face merciless gameplay to explore a cursed castle, discover the dark tales of its inhabitants, and kill the gods of a decaying world.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: 2 GHz Intel Core 7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 530 Storage: 2 GB available space
